source.3cb7ce9b: Sweetviz is an open-source Python library that generates beautiful, high-density visualizations to kickstart EDA (Exploratory Data Analysis) with just two lines of code. Output is a fully self-contained HTML application.
source.de1a20ab: *Comparison.html* can be downloaded and viewed from the Kaggle Output directory

source.bfd338c1:
Automatically Visualize any dataset, any size with a single line of code.
AutoViz performs automatic visualization of any dataset with one line. Give any input file (CSV, txt or json) and AutoViz will visualize it.
